title: Advanced Cartesian coordinate system learning program for engineering practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational engineering mathematics and understanding of mechatronics systems
context.additional_context: Practical skill-focused program for in-service professionals to improve spatial reasoning. Immersive learning combining VR/simulation tools and mechatronics concepts in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: A robot's position coordinates (X,Y) in a 2D coordinate system can be tracked in real-time and accurately plotted on a graph
Coordinate transformation (translation/rotation) problems can be solved with over 85% accuracy using experiential simulation tools
Design documentation applying coordinate system concepts to actual mechatronics systems can be completed through team projects
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
